title: Top Places to visit in Ranipet, Tamil Nadu
content: Ranipet also known as Ranipettai (lit. Queen's colony) is a town in Ranipet district, It is a suburb and industrial hub of Vellore city in the state of Tamil Nadu in southern India. It is a medium-sized community located about 20 kilometers from the Vellore city center (from Vellore Fort) and als
